meanings.sent1: I love to cook dinner for my family every night.
meanings.sent2: My mom will cook a delicious meal for us tonight.
meanings.sent3: The robot tried to cook dinner, but it ended up burning everything!
meanings.sent4: Her passion for cooking can be seen in every dish she cooks.
meanings.sent5: The chef's ability to cook gourmet meals amazed everyone at the restaurant.

meanings.definition: A person who prepares food for eating
meanings.sent1: The cook in the restaurant is known for his tasty dishes.
meanings.sent2: My grandma used to be a cook in a famous hotel.
meanings.sent3: The cook at the school cafeteria always has a smile on his face.
meanings.sent4: She is a master cook who can create culinary wonders.
meanings.sent5: The cook's apron was stained with various ingredients after a busy day in the kitchen.
